title: Centaur
entryLore: Centaurs hail from the Feywild, mystically resonating with the natural world. Combining the upper body of an elf with the lower body of a horse, they are swift and powerful wanderers of the wild realms. They often travel in herds, protecting the ancient forests and meadows they call home with a fierce and noble spirit.

traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If you move at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee attack on the same turn, you can immediately make one attack with your hooves against that target as a [[bonus_action|Bonus Action]].

traits.name: Equine Build
traits.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift. In addition, any climb that requires an ability check costs you 4 extra feet of movement for every 1 foot you move.

traits.name: Hooves
traits.description: You can use your hooves to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals 1d6 + your Strength modifier bludgeoning damage, instead of the normal bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Natural Affinity
traits.description: You have [[proficiency|proficiency]] in one of the following skills of your choice: [[animal_handling|Animal Handling]], [[medicine|Medicine]], [[nature|Nature]], or [[survival|Survival]].
